mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exhi(exhino, name, cnt, rdate, seqno) VALUES(exhi_seq.nextval, #{name}, 0, sysdate, #{seqno})
mapper.select: SELECT exhino, name, cnt, rdate, seqno, visible FROM exhi ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT exhino, name, cnt, rdate, seqno, visible FROM exhi WHERE visible='Y' ORDER BY exhino ASC

SELECT r.categrpno as r_categrpno, r.name as r_name, c.exhino, c.categrpno, c.name, c.seqno, c.visible, c.rdate, c.cnt FROM categrp r, exhi c WHERE r.categrpno = c.categrpno ORDER BY r.categrpno ASC, c.seqno ASC

SELECT r.categrpno as r_categrpno, r.name as r_name, c.exhino, c.categrpno, c.name, c.seqno, c.visible, c.rdate, c.cnt FROM categrp r, exhi c WHERE (r.categrpno = c.categrpno) AND r.categrpno=#{categrpno} ORDER BY r.categrpno ASC, c.seqno ASC
